user_query: I'm organizing a company team-building event and I need to find suitable locations near our office.

TaskList.description: Determine the geographical coordinates of the office location.
Find cities within a 10-kilometer radius of the office location using the coordinates obtained from step 1.
For each city found in step 2, retrieve details including names, populations, countries, and distances from the office.
Gather information on administrative divisions near the office location, including their names, populations, and coordinates.
